attributes.action: Withdraw President Trump's invitation to the UK
attributes.additional_details: President Trump’s views and policies towards refugees and migrants, towards black people and Muslims, to women, on climate change, and on matters of war and peace are rejected by the overwhelming majority of people in this country. His presence will create division and fan the flames of right wing extremism.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call on the government of the United Kingdom to withdraw its invitation to Donald Trump, the President of the United States, to visit this country in mid-July 2018.
